title: Microsoft unveils tabbed File Explorer and other Windows 11 features
content:
Today, Microsoft is holding a big event around Windows, and along with a bunch of new Windows 365 features, there’s also a lot for Windows 11. Strangely, a lot of the features being announced today…have already been announced. If you’re testing out Windows 11 in the Dev channel, you’ve already seen some of this. Revamped

The post Microsoft unveils tabbed File Explorer and other Windows 11 features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is announcing a range of new features that are coming to Windows 11, including the recently-discovered tabbed File Explorer.
